wikipedia_page.main: David Trumble (born 6 March 1986) is a British film writer/director and political cartoonist for The Sun newspaper.

response: The Shift is a short film directed by David Trumble, starring Greg Lock and Graham Hornsby. The film, written by David Trumble, Matt Brothers, and Greg Lock, focuses on a paramedic and Emergency Medical Technician (EMT) working for the London Ambulance Service on a night shift.
thumb|300px|David Trumble and Greg Lock at the premiere of The Shift with David Williams, Helen Baxendale and members of the Oxford Community Foundation
